Summary A SAP professional with 6+ years of experience in SAP BI & 4+ years in BI/BW performing activities ranging from gathering reporting requirements and creating a technical solution on a daily basis to administer BI components in SAP and SAP Business Objects. 
 
Hands on experience undertaking performance tuning activities for SAP BI and BOBJ, managing upgrades, creating technical and functional design and support, up keeping the Knowledge Management System. 
 
- Undertook world class Trainings and workshops to develop my skills in SAP, Some of my Trainings and workshops that would benefit this position are : 
 
• Certified Business Objects Web Intelligence XI 3.x 
• Certified Business Intelligence 7.1  
• SAP HANA, SAP BODS and BPC Training underway. 
• Requirement Gathering skills and techniques

Summary An Experienced Software Developer and overall technology enthusiast who passionate to learn new technologies in dynamic challenging environments.My main interests are focused towards Java related Middleware Technologies,Linux based environments,Server-Side technologies,Continuous Integration,Virtualization,Cloud Technologies.Being an effective communicator with the sound knowledge and experience in IT related Technologies,wanted to become a successful IT professional. 
 
Apart from that,as a Professional Singer and a Musician,I have given my contribution to the  
Sri Lankan Film industry in several occasions.
